item.title: Pressure Regulating and Shutoff Valve Closed Position Indicating System – Engine Bleed Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative for associated inoperative ENG BLEED Pressure Regulating and Shutoff Valve.

numlitem.para: Operations into known or forecasted icing conditions are prohibited.
Aircraft remains at or below FL350.

placard.para: Placard Bleed Switch "ENGINE BLEED AIR INOP DUE TO OFF LIGHT" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
